<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1926) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Impressive Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1922)

</column>

---

Under your care and training, your mount has realized its innate potential. The mount you gained through the [Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919) feat becomes a [nimble](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=2&Advanced=true) or [savage](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=1&Advanced=true) animal companion (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

<title level="2">Incredible Mount leads to...</title>
[Specialized Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1929)
name: Incredible Mount
